name: Ambre
description:
Ambre tells the meeting of a depressed thirty years old man with a lost little girl he takes in his house. Their cohabitation quickly becomes very strange, if not creepy, until the story breaks apart to reveal a terrible secret.


Ambre Loli heroine of the story. Likes fairytales, stuffed toys, pink and princesses. She seems so innocent and cute, it's difficult to refuse her anything. A kind man in his thirties, totally depressed since his wife disappeared. He has a secret way too heavy to carry alone… Tristan


  • Writing / Project Leader: Helia
  • Art: Eolyus, Melow
  • Music: Kimino, Roganis
  • Programming: Keul
  • GUI: Melow

Created for Nanoreno 2013
